sentences.sContent: With his deadly sickle and necromancy, Dutin becomes one of the most dangerous warriors in Ruminater now.
sentences.sContent_eng: With his deadly sickle and necromancy, Dutin becomes one of the most dangerous warriors in Ruminater now.
sentences.sCn: 现在，藉著他的致命镰刀与死灵术，杜丁成为了反刍者中最危险的战士之一。

sentences.sContent: Crowds have queued to attend the case, which has exposed a world of infidelity, necromancy and incredible wealth.
sentences.sContent_eng: Crowds have queued to attend the case, which has exposed a world of infidelity, necromancy and incredible wealth.
sentences.sCn: 大批的人排起了长队去旁听这场将不忠、巫术、招魂和巨额财富彻底曝光的官司。

sentences.sContent: He could have booked the room in private, set up some gear, and conducted his own private little tea party, but hosting a paranormal conference gave the necromancy the sheen of respectability.
sentences.sContent_eng: He could have booked the room in private, set up some gear, and conducted his own private little tea party, but hosting a paranormal conference gave the necromancy the sheen of respectability.
sentences.sCn: 其实他本可以订一间私密一点的房间，准备些家伙事儿，搞一场小型的座谈会。 不过，举办一场有关超自然力的会议，可以给足巫师们面子。
